channel.title: 2 questions about server (clicking on items) (trisidiax source 317)
channel.description:
Will i got 2 questions-
i want in my server when you click on the Quest "lost city" it opens a window talking about how to start it this is in runescape. if you need any media.
also how do i make it so when i make abyssal whip + milk(the one you get from cows) = abyssal vine whip what i mean is in a trisidax look alike they made vial + whip = water whip how do i make it so when i click on those 2 items together it gives me a abyssal vine whip.

item.title: 2 questions about server (clicking on items) (trisidiax source 317)
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

You should get the clickingbutton ID from your sources cmd

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions about server (clicking on items) (trisidiax source 317)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“RSPS MAKER Carlos, post:1, topic:471587”]Will i got 2 questions-

i want in my server when you click on the Quest “lost city” it opens a window talking about how to start it
this is in runescape. if you need any media.

also how do i make it so when i
make
abyssal whip + milk(the one you get from cows) = abyssal vine whip
what i mean is in a trisidax look alike they made vial + whip = water whip how do i make it so when i click on those 2 items together it gives me a abyssal vine whip.[/quote]
For the whip, you would need to use your ItemOnItem class, and have item 1 be the whip, item 2 be the milk. It would then delete item 1+2, and make item 3 (the vine whip).

For the quest, you need to get the clicking button ID of lost city, and have it open the quest interface, which would display the information you set it to.

Off Topic:
You’re signature says “Coding for the leechers” Uh, you are supposed to program, not code. You write code, not do it.

Read full topic
item.source: 2 questions about server (clicking on items) (trisidiax source 317)
